mapper.insert: insert into user_role (id, user_id, role_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_role set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, role_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from user_role
